'''The Desert Will Guide You Home (I)''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Sumeru: The Gilded Desert - Series I]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to follow 10 [[Seelie]] to their Seelie Courts in [[Hypostyle Desert]], [[Land of Upper Setekh]], and [[Land of Lower Setekh]].
